data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chandra, Kailash (2017): Nososticta nicobarica sp. nov. (Odonata: Platycnemididae: Disparoneurinae) from Great Nicobar Island, India. Zootaxa 4311 (3): 426-434, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4311.3.8|1 occurrence
